#summary Searches for key/value pairs in the generic store.
#labels Protocol-Generic

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||`RequestMethod`||GetGenerics||String||Yes||
||`OwnerID`||Owner UUID of the entries to search||String||Optional^1^||
||`Type`||Type of entries to search for||String||Yes||
||`Key`||Key to search for||String||Optional^1^||

  * ^1^Either `OwnerID` or `Key` must be given

{{{
RequestMethod=GetGenerics
&OwnerID=0dff5920-282a-11df-8a39-0800200c9a66
&Type=Friend
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`Success`||True if zero or more entries were returned, False if a Message was returned||Boolean||
||`Entries`||Array of generic entries that matched the query||Array, see below||
||`Message`||Error message||String||

== Entries Format ==

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||`OwnerID`||Owner UUID of the entry||UUID||
||`Key`||Key name||String||
||`Value`||Free-form value string||String||

Success:

{{{
{
    "Success":true,
    "Entries":
    [
        {
            "OwnerID":"0dff5920-282a-11df-8a39-0800200c9a66",
            "Key":"9d00ff70-282a-11df-8a39-0800200c9a66",
            "Value":"38"
        },
        {
            "OwnerID":"0dff5920-282a-11df-8a39-0800200c9a66",
            "Key":"c4bca8c0-282a-11df-8a39-0800200c9a66",
            "Value":"0"
        },
    ]
}
}}}

Failure:

{{{
{
    "Success":false,
    "Message":"An unknown error occurred"
}
}}}
